Mr. Sara L. Becker
-2-
February 7, 1961
We want to know about universities, colleges, extension
correspondence programs, and state or city school systems,
as well as ETV stations. Although the survey is directed
primarily to a consideration of the need for broadcast channels,
we also want to locate places where closed circuit systems may
be used for transmission of instructional materials.
Since this request is being addressed to several NAEB-ers
in your state, I don't expect anyone to report exhaustively on
individual activities (for your own operations, that'll come
later.) At this stage, I merely want to know "who" is doing
roughly "what”, so that I can obtain a profile of present and
future planning in your area.
With ease (and a speedy reply) in mind, I've enclosed
a form which you may find to be useful. I'm sure you'll under¬
stand that I will appreciate the highest priority you can give
this request.
Cordially yours,
Ray J. Stanley
WHA-TV/^adio Hall
Madisofc/6, Wisconsin
